summary: My first player house mod that uses the Goldenglow Estate in Riften as a template, but in order for you to complete the house you must complete the "Morfree Lodge" Quest which starts when the game starts. This house could be considered a vanilla house because you can send your spouse their with no other mods and you have to purchase everyth
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][center]-----------------------
Introducing Morfree Lodge:
-----------------------[/center][/size][/font][/b][center][size=4][u][b]Location:[/b][/u][/size] [size=3]Behind Riverwood's Sleeping Giant Inn[/size][/center]
[url=http://s1368.photobucket.com/user/tesv1992tesv1992/media/house_zpse666efae.png.html][img]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag171/tesv1992tesv1992/house_zpse666efae.png[/img][/url]

[center][u][b][size=5]ModINFO:[/size][/b][/u][/center][b][size=4]⦁    Contains exterior decorations along with animals and a rideable horse.
⦁    Contains a Library with plenty of bookshelves and a hot tub.
[b][size=4]⦁    There are multiple containers such as arrow container, weapon container, armor container, ingredient container, ingot container, etc.[/size][/b]
⦁    Contains a Blacksmith Forge, Smelter, Tanning Rack, Armor Workbench, Alchemy Table, Enchanter, and other things that you will have to download to figure out.[/size][/b]


[center]
[size=4][youtube]lmXmMIo_xfU[/youtube]
[font=Courier New][b]====================================================================================
The House will be complete after you complete the"Morfree Lodge" Quest.
====================================================================================[/b][/font][/size][font=Courier New][b][size=3]

[u]Note:[/u] [/size][/b][size=3]This house could be considered a vanilla house because you have to buy the house and decorations and you can send your spouse there when you are married.
[/size][/font]

[size=4][u][b]Known Bug:[/b][/u] [/size][i][size=4]When I bought the exterior upgrade, the dog didn't appear for me, but it may have just been my computer.[/size]
[/i][/center]
author: Apocalympse1992
